Rewards Rate: 4 RPs/₹200 Spent on Dining and Travel. 2 RPs/₹200 Spent on All Categories Other than Select Categories
Reward Redemption: Redeem Your Reward Points at YESREWARDZ

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Joining Fee Waiver on Spend of ₹10,000 Within the First 30 Days of Card Issuance. On Annual Spends of ₹1 Lakh, Get the Annual Fee Waiver
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% surcharge waiver on fuel transactions across all fuel stations for transactions between Rs 400 to Rs 5000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the transaction amount subject to a minimum charge of Rs 300.

product_details: Annual fee of ₹499 plus applicable taxes
2 Reward Points for every ₹200 spent on all categories other than select categories
1 Reward Point for every ₹200 on Select categories
4 Reward Points for every ₹200 spent on dining and travel
Annual fee waiver on annual spending of ₹1 lakh
1% surcharge waiver on fuel transactions across all fuel stations
